title: Urban Freight and Last Mile Delivery Optimization

quizzes.question: What is one of the main challenges in urban logistics mentioned in the transcript?
quizzes.explanation: The transcript highlights congestion as a major issue due to the high volume of delivery vehicles in narrow city streets.

quizzes.question: How do AI and machine learning contribute to route optimization?
options: By predicting weather conditions weeks in advance
By analyzing real-time data and traffic patterns
By increasing the number of delivery vehicles
By reducing the size of delivery packages
quizzes.explanation: AI and machine learning analyze real-time data and traffic patterns to dynamically adjust delivery routes, reducing delays and fuel consumption.

quizzes.question: What is the purpose of the DELPHI project?
options: To integrate urban freight and passenger transport
To create a new type of delivery vehicle
quizzes.explanation: The DELPHI project aims to integrate urban freight and passenger transport through digital platforms to optimize route planning and reduce congestion.
